It also one randomize control trial directly compare different outreach medium directly , oppose different variation within single medium ( e.g . two different type letter ) . Lastly , give unique patient demographic makeup Fenway , include significant number lesbian bisexual woman transmen , secondary subanalyses potential significantly add investigator ' knowledge medium work best conduct cervical cancer screen outreach sexual gender minority , disproportionately underscreened compare heterosexual cis-gendered woman .
